name: iSpy-ify (EPILEPSY WARN!)
description: Turns every level/menu into eye-bleeding brain candy like the hit level iSpyWithMyLittleEye by Voxicat!!! Also includes some funny "eye closing/opening" sections that randomly spawn as you play. :)

mod-enabled.name: Mod Enabled
mod-enabled.description: Enable/disable the flashing as a whole.

demon-list-ban-title.name: Banned from the iSpy Demon List
demon-list-ban-title.description: The "Blinking Eye Enabled" setting MUST be on for your verification/record to be accepted.

blinking-eye-disabled.name: Blinking Eye Disabled
blinking-eye-disabled.description: Disables the feature where an eye appears and the level gets dark as it blinks (like the part in iSpy.)
